data.comment: The match is underway. Spezia have kicked-off.
Davide Ghersini signals a Spezia throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In the minute 1, Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tommaso Pobega.
Davide Ghersini waits before resuming play because Jeremy Toljan for Sassuolo is still down.
In the minute 3, Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
Spezia's Emmanuel Gyasi goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Important block from the Spezia defence as Filip Djuricic fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Sassuolo's Jeremy Toljan is back in action after a slight knock.
Tommaso Pobega has recovered and rejoins the match in La Spezia.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Sassuolo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
In the minute 9, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Filip Djuricic puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 12, Gian Marco Ferrari instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Spezia.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Spezia's Kevin Agudelo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Francesco Caputo for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 20, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 29, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Spezia in the half of Sassuolo.
Goal! Andrey Galabinov equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Matteo Ricci to set up the goal.
Can Sassuolo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
Free kick in a good position for Sassuolo!
In the minute 34, Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in La Spezia.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Davide Ghersini signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Davide Ghersini awards Spezia a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Davide Ghersini awards the away team a throw-in.
In La Spezia Sassuolo attack through Francesco Caputo. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In the minute 44, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick Sassuolo.
Jacopo Sala is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, Manuel Locatelli hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Sassuolo!
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In La Spezia, Filip Djuricic of Sassuolo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Davide Ghersini signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 45, Spezia are pushing forward but Kevin Agudelo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Spezia drive upfield and Matteo Ricci gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 45, Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in La Spezia to check on Domenico Berardi, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 45, Filip Djuricic for Sassuolo has been booked by Davide Ghersini and receives a first yellow card.
It's Sassuolo with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Mert Muldur replacing Giorgos Kyriakopoulos.
Mehdi Bourabia is replacing Pedro Obiang for Sassuolo at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 50, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 53, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Spezia.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 54, Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Free kick Sassuolo.
Sassuolo drive forward but Francesco Caputo is judged offside.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 60, Davide Ghersini signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Spezia's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spezia defender.
In the minute 63, Sassuolo have been awarded a penalty...
Jeroen Zoet (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Davide Ghersini.
Domenico Berardi nets and Sassuolo now lead 1-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 66, In La Spezia Sassuolo drive forward through Francesco Caputo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal! Gregoire Defrel extends Sassuolo's lead to 1-3.
That's a fine assist from Francesco Caputo.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 69, Hamed Junior Traore is replacing Gregoire Defrel for the away team.
The home team replace Kevin Agudelo with Diego Farias.
Spezia make their second substitution with Alessandro Deiola replacing Paolo Bartolomei.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Tommaso Pobega with Luca Mora. This is the third substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andrey Galabinov hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Spezia.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Davide Ghersini awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
It's now 1-4 in La Spezia as Francesco Caputo scores for Sassuolo.
That's a fine assist from Gian Marco Ferrari.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Kaan Ayhan is on a sub for Vlad Chiriches for Sassuolo.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a fourth substitution, with Salva Ferrer replacing Jacopo Sala.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Spezia.
Sassuolo push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Filip Djuricic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spezia defence.
Davide Ghersini signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 83, Can Sassuolo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In La Spezia, Manuel Locatelli of Sassuolo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Juan Ramos (Spezia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 86, Luca Mora gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
Andrey Galabinov (Spezia) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 87, Davide Ghersini awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Spezia make their fifth substitution with Julian Chabot replacing Cristian Dell`Orco.
Federico Ricci is replacing Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 89, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Diego Farias for Spezia drives towards goal at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
The match has come to a close in La Spezia. The final score is 1-4.
